trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged> event occurs whenever the item in a list is changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged>每當變更清單中的項目時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, this event will occur when the text of the list item is changed to a new value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，清單項目的文字變更為新值時，會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised when the item is moved to a new position within the list because of a new item being added.
trans-unit.target: 當項目，會因為要加入新項目移動到新的位置清單中，不會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> named `CurrencyManager1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>名為`CurrencyManager1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the position of the item being changed within the list.
trans-unit.target: 指示清單中變更項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index to the item being changed.
trans-unit.target: 變更的項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> named `CurrencyManager1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>名為`CurrencyManager1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
